alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 17 at 1:19PM AKST until February 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occuring. Additional snow accumulation less than 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow reducing visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions have improved around Chevak and Hooper Bay and will improve over the lower Yukon River valley through the afternoon.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
